document_data.name: Igi clan
document_data.mainbody: The '''Igi clan''' was a [[samurai]] clan, led by [[Igi Saturo]], that became a noble house thanks to a marriage with the [[Tsu family]] in [[Miyama Province]] in [[Kozakura]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: They controlled the [[mokudai]] position and tried to acquire as many [[zussho]] positions as possible. They cared almost nothing about the [[shogun]] and [[shikken]], and concentrated their efforts only in Miyama.
